item.title: Passive Recon(OSINT) Resources
item.description: Passive Reconnaissance To gather intelligence on a target without actively interacting with the target. This is a list of tools which use passive reconnaissance techniques(E.g., OSINT, etc) to gather information on a target. ⚠️ Some resources may also contain additional tools that act outside passive reconnaissance techniques and may actively engage the target. ⚠️ Regarding my notes: The brackets() after each tool will indicate if the tool is: (built-in) = available in Kali’s repo.
item.dc:creator: Matt Raupfer
